UI.noInput: Please answer before viewing the solution

question: A(n) ________ marketing channel partners with intermediaries including distributors, wholesalers, agents, or retailers to sell and distribute its products.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. A vertical channel system is when companies in the marketing channel work together in a coordinated, collaborative, and customer-centric way.
That’s not correct. A multichannel marketing system exists when a company uses a variety of channels, such as stores and online, to distribute products and services.
That’s not correct. An omnichannel marketing system allows consumers to buy and receive products and services seamlessly across a variety of channels, including online and in-store.
An indirect marketing channel relies on a partnership with intermediaries to sell and distribute its products.

detailedSolution: An indirect marketing channel relies on a partnership with intermediaries to sell and distribute its products.
